testcase.name: Verify Send a invalid url in the API call (request body)and check for errors
testcase.system-out: * def jsUtils = read('classpath:com/egov/utils/jsUtils.js') ............... passed * def urlShortenConstant = read('../../core-services/constants/urlShortening.yaml') . passed * call read('../../core-services/pretests/urlShorteningPretest.feature@urlShortenFail') . passed * assert urlShortenResponseBody.Errors[0].message == urlShortenConstant.errorMessages.forInvalidUrl . passed
